author: ElsW
title: Who rescues the rescuer?
review: Overall a fun set, relatively straight-forward build.  However the wings do not attach secure,y enough to the fuselage and are constantly falling off- even with my diy reinforcements.  Luckily my boys think it's hilarious that the coastguard plane crashes - but for the more faint-hearted children then be prepared to explain plane crashes and risks associated with hypothermia.....
